CustomField.formula:
IF ( ISPICKVAL( Statut__c ,"Nouvelle") , IMAGE("/resource/1557245962000/ICONS_Nouvelle?", "Nouvelle", 30 ,30 ) ,
IF ( ISPICKVAL( Statut__c ,"En cours") , IMAGE("/resource/1557401171000/ICONS_En_Cours?", "En cours", 30 ,30 ) ,
IF ( ISPICKVAL( Statut__c ,"Fermée") , IMAGE("/resource/1551194734000/ICONS_ACC_Closed_Establishment?", "Fermée", 30 ,30 ) ,
"" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Icône Statut
